attributes.action: Ban Donald Trump from visiting the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
"Considered to be engaging in unacceptable behaviour by fostering hatred which might lead to inter community violence in the United Kingdom".

Is the way the bans are worded in the case of other Americans who have tried to visit the UK but who's social, political or religious behaviours are thought to pose a risk to our communities. Trump is not welcome here. We need to explain that to him.
attributes.background: Donald Trump is now President of the USA. This has not stopped his racist and sexist behaviour.  His restriction of Muslims in particular is not acceptable in the UK. There is significant evidence that he has incited violence at his public rallies. This is not a man we want in our country.
